item.title: New Container: Limnoria
item.description: We have released a new container for Limnoria! Limnoria A robust, full-featured, and user/programmer-friendly Python IRC bot, with many existing plugins. Successor of the well-known Supybot.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Limnoria!

Limnoria A robust, full-featured, and user/programmer-friendly Python IRC bot, with many existing plugins. Successor of the well-known Supybot.
